headline: Some stuff is jank, but it's gonna get better
Arrow keys move between slides
body: Left and right arrows navigate. (Mobile Nav coming soon)
Press **?** to see all keyboard shortcuts.

headline: Press E to open the edit drawer
body: This is where you change text, swap or add slides, add images.
Press **E** to try it on this slide. It auto saves! (Undo coming soon)

headline: Press T for themes
body: Switch between presets or hit random.
Themes update live, and can be saved and named.

headline: Everything exports as JSON
body: JSON is a file format that stores data (slides) in a simple, list-like structure.
Press **D** to export a deck as JSON. Press **U** to upload one.
AI tools can help edit JSON files.

headline: Everything saves locally
body: Nothing leaves your device unless you export it.

headline: Make slides and go wild
body: Click **Back** to start a new deck.
